name: terraform-aws-lambda-helper
description: A terraform module to deploy a lambda function.

scripts.build: tsc && cp package*.json build/ && cd build && NODE_ENV=production npm ci
scripts.build:plan: npm run build && command -v terraform 2>&1 >/dev/null && terraform plan -var-file=terraform.tfvars -out tfplan.bin
scripts.plan:json: npm run build:plan && terraform show -json tfplan.bin > tfplan.json
scripts.deploy: npm run build:plan && terraform apply tfplan.bin

author: James Grow
